greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Replace n with concatenation of its odd divisors >1.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: | otherwise      = read $ concat $ (map show) $ tail $ a182469_row n
odd_divisors_gt1 = [d for d in divisors(n)[1:] if d%2 == 1]
else: return int("".join(str(d) for d in odd_divisors_gt1))
print([a(n) for n in range(1, 52)]) # _Michael S. Branicky_, Dec 31 2020
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
